text: is a retired Japanese footballer. He is a defender. He was educated at and played for the National Institute of Fitness and Sports in Kanoya before signing for J2 club, V-Varen Nagasaki. In 2016, he signed for Albirex Niigata FC (Singapore)http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/17152/ from the S.League before moving to Sleauge club, Hougang United.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/21521/ In 2018, he signed for Cambodian club Phnom Penh Crown FC.
